abilities.name: Battle Fury
abilities.description: Innate: Tryndamere gains  5 Fury each time he lands a basic attack, and 10 Fury on  critical strikes and each time he kills an enemy. After not dealing or receiving damage for 8 seconds, Tryndamere loses 5 Fury per second.
descriptions: Innate: Tryndamere gains  5 Fury each time he lands a basic attack, and 10 Fury on  critical strikes and each time he kills an enemy. After not dealing or receiving damage for 8 seconds, Tryndamere loses 5 Fury per second.
Tryndamere gains  0.35% − 0.5% (based on level) critical strike chance per point of Fury, up to a maximum of 35% − 50% (based on level) critical strike chance.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Passive: Tryndamere permanently gains  bonus attack damage, and gains additional bonus attack damage per  1% of his missing health.
abilities.leveling: Bonus AD:»5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 AD«Bonus AD Per Missing Health:»0.15 / 0.2 / 0.25 / 0.3 / 0.35 AD«Maximum Bonus AD:20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 AD
levelings: Bonus AD:»5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 AD«Bonus AD Per Missing Health:»0.15 / 0.2 / 0.25 / 0.3 / 0.35 AD«Maximum Bonus AD:20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 AD
descriptions: Passive: Tryndamere permanently gains  bonus attack damage, and gains additional bonus attack damage per  1% of his missing health.
Active: Tryndamere consumes all of his  Fury and  heals himself, increased for every point of Fury consumed.

abilities.name: Mocking Shout
abilities.description: Active: Tryndamere reduces the  attack damage of all nearby enemy  champions for 4 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Tryndamere reduces the  attack damage of all nearby enemy  champions for 4 seconds.
Targets who have their backs turned to him are also  slowed for the duration.

abilities.name: Spinning Slash
abilities.description: Active: Tryndamere  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in his path and gaining  2 Fury per enemy hit.
descriptions: Active: Tryndamere  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in his path and gaining  2 Fury per enemy hit.
Spinning Slash's  cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere's basic attacks  critically strike on-hit, increased to 2 seconds against  champions.

abilities.name: Undying Rage
abilities.description: Active: Tryndamere instantly gains  Fury and becomes immune to  death for 5 seconds, during which his  health cannot fall below a certain amount.
descriptions: Active: Tryndamere instantly gains  Fury and becomes immune to  death for 5 seconds, during which his  health cannot fall below a certain amount.
Undying Rage can be used when affected by  crowd control.

name: Tryndamere
title: the Barbarian King
blurb: Fueled by unbridled fury and rage, Tryndamere once carved his way through the Freljord, openly challenging the greatest warriors of the north to prepare himself for even darker days ahead. The wrathful barbarian has long sought revenge for the...
